name: Traffic Car Race 2017
description: Have you ever wanted to be the car racer in city road? Pick your sports car and join the racing challenge. Race head to head with cars to become a racing champion in this Traffic Car Race 2017. car gear is in full throttle and the foot is on the pedal, all you have to do is take control and drive your cars on some of the racing tracks around. Realize your dream with this Fast, and action packed Traffic Car Race 2017 game. In this car racing game you will think that you are a rider of sports car. This car racing game has all the racing enthusiasts want to have: from nobody to the most wanted, you will use your excellent driving skills to win a higher performance car.Enjoy road trip with  traffic express and become a legend with racing. Racing and other road racing fever games then must enjoy these cars with  racing steering wheel legends.
